markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Eradicate Undeath](/Spells.aspx?ID=1793)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 374 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

A massive deluge of life energy causes the undead to fall apart. Each [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature in the area takes 4d12 vitality damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d12.
name: Eradicate Undeath

text: Eradicate Undeath Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 374 2.0 Domain Death Area 30-foot cone Defense basic Fortitude --- A massive deluge of life energy causes the undead to fall apart. Each undead creature in the area takes 4d12 vitality damage. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.
